column4: Percentage of Cases to total Cases for Trial Compounded or Withdrawn (Col.4)
column5: Percentage of Cases to total Cases For Trial in Which Trials Were Completed (Convicted) (Col.5)
column6: Percentage of Cases to total Cases for Trial in Which Trials Were Completed (Acquitted Or Discharged) (Col.6)
column7: Percentage of Cases to total Cases for Trial in Which Trials Were Completed (Total) (Col.7) = {(Col.5) + (Col.6)}
column8: Percentage of Cases to total Cases for Trial Pending trial at the end of the year (Col.8)
